alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 12:29PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern White Pine and southeastern Elko Counties through 100 PM PDT... At 1228 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Lages Junction, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern White Pine and southeastern Elko Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; White Pine County
